message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. We believe its value far exceeds $1200000, reflecting its unique features and capabilities. To ensure a mutually beneficial transaction, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. Please let us know if this proposition aligns with your expectations or if you would like to discuss further details.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was hoping to negotiate a better price. I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
